name: ClustExp_HistTable.py
author: AFNI Developers
description: Script to extract the data table from history of datasets from 3dttest++, 3dMVM, or 3dLME.

inputs.description: Name for output (no path). Default is GroupOut.
inputs.name: Prefix

inputs.description: Output parent folder if you don't want the current working directory. Default is ./
inputs.name: Session

inputs.description: Remove previous folder with same PREFIX
inputs.name: Overwrite

output-files.description: Table with information parsed from the statistics dataset history.
output-files.name: GroupTable
